Name:
* Andris Reinholds LAT disqualified for doping. 




Men's Single sculls - Rowing - Sydney 2000 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     Athletes competed in preliminary heats, repechage heats, semifinals and finals. The best athletes from each heat (Q) advanced to the next level. The winner of the final was the Gold Medal winner. Event facts: Men's Single sculls competition was held at the Penrith Lake and 24 athletes participated in the event. 





These results for Men's Single sculls - Sydney 2000 Summer Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database
